00061     SelfDoc doc;
00062     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());

00068 /**
00069  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00070  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00071  */
00072 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster::getDefaultDocOptions()
00073 {
00074   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00075 
00076   SelfDoc::Opt CovariateOrder = {"order", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "", "", "", "", "Covariate order"};
00077   opts.push_back(CovariateOrder);
00078 
00079   SelfDoc::Opt BinType = {"bin-type", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "", "", "", "", "Bin type"};
00080   opts.push_back(BinType);
00081 
00082   SelfDoc::Opt BinCount = {"bin-count", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "", "", "", "", "Bin count"};
00083   opts.push_back(BinCount);
00084 
00085   SelfDoc::Opt IQRScaling = {"iqr-scaling", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "", "", "", "", "Apply IQR scaling"};
00086   opts.push_back(IQRScaling);
00087 
00088   SelfDoc::Opt SubtractFromXY = {"subtract-from-XY", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "", "", "", "", "Subtract median from X and Y."};
00089   opts.push_back(SubtractFromXY);
00090 
00091   return opts;
00092 }

00107     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00108     CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster();

00111     //pMethod->BinType = setupStringParameter("bin-type", "", params, doc, opts);
00112     //pMethod->BinCount = setupStringParameter("bin-count", "", params, doc, opts);

00117 // TODO: this needs to be templatized and moved to CNAnalysisMethod.h
00118 // to avoid clonig CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::covariateAdjustLog2Ratio()
00119 //
00120 void CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster::run()
00121 {
00122     int iXChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome");
00123     int iYChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome");
00124     int numCovariates = CovariateParams::m_vLRCovariates.size();
00125     if (numCovariates == 0)
00126     {
00127         return;
00128     }
00129 
00130     // Check if any covariate values were read from the annotation file or covariates file
00131     if (getProbeSets()->size() > 0 && getProbeSets()->getAt(0)->getNumCovariates() == 0)
00132     {
00133         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("disable-covariates-file-warning") == false)
00134         {
00135             Verbose::warn(1, "Covariate adjustment is disabled. No covariate values were loaded. annotation-file does not support covariates.");
00136             m_pEngine->setOpt("disable-covariates-file-warning", "true");
00137         }
00138         return;
00139     }
00140 
00141     const float IQRepsilon = 1.0e-10;
00142 
00143     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster::run()...");
00144     Verbose::progressBegin(3, "Run covariate log2 ratio adjustment", numCovariates*2, 1, numCovariates*2);
00145 
00146     char validProcessFlags[] = { 1, 3 };      // CN and SNP, resp.
00147 
00148     // Find out if marker-class is one of the covariates
00149     int markerClassIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("marker-class");
00150 
00151     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data")) {
00152         writeLog2Ratios("beforeCovariateAdjust");
00153     }
00154 
00155     for (int iCovariateIndex = 0; iCovariateIndex < numCovariates; iCovariateIndex++)
00156     {
00157         int iTransIndex = CovariateParams::m_vLRCovariates[iCovariateIndex];
00158         int maxFlagIndex = 2;      // the default number of marker classes (i.e. SNP and CN)
00159         if (markerClassIndex == iTransIndex)
00160         {
00161             // This is the marker-class covariate, so do not distinguish SNP and CN in what follows
00162             maxFlagIndex = 1;      // do the loop below only once (i.e. it's one class of markers)
00163         }
00164         for (int iFlagIndex = 0; iFlagIndex < maxFlagIndex; iFlagIndex++)
00165         {
00166             string intermSuffix;
00167             if (maxFlagIndex == 1) {
00168                 intermSuffix = "_MARKER_CLASS";
00169             } else if (validProcessFlags[iFlagIndex] == 1) {
00170                 intermSuffix = "_CN";
00171             } else if (validProcessFlags[iFlagIndex] == 3) {
00172                 intermSuffix = "_SNP";
00173             } else {
00174                 intermSuffix = "_INVALID_FLAG";
00175             }
00176 
00177             vector<float> covariates;
00178             vector<std::pair<int, int> > binInfo;
00179             vector<int> probeSetsToProcess;
00180 
00181             Verbose::progressStep(3);
00182 
00183             // NB: local probe sets of CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio (process flag = 1 or 3)
00184             for (int iPSIndex = 0; iPSIndex < getProbeSets()->size(); iPSIndex++)
00185             {
00186                 CNProbeSet *pset = (*getProbeSets())[iPSIndex];
00187                 float covValue = pset->getCovariateValue(iTransIndex);
00188 
00189                 if ((maxFlagIndex == 1 || pset->getProcessFlag() == validProcessFlags[iFlagIndex]) &&
00190                     covValue == covValue)
00191                 {
00192                     covariates.push_back(covValue);
00193                     binInfo.push_back(std::make_pair(0, iPSIndex));
00194                     probeSetsToProcess.push_back(iPSIndex);
00195                 }
00196             }
00197             vector<int> binning(covariates.size());
00198             int numBins = determineBins(covariates, binning, iCovariateIndex);
00199 
00200             // fill in the binning info
00201             for (int i = 0; i < binInfo.size(); i++) {
00202                 binInfo[i].first = binning[i];
00203             }
00204 
00205             // figure out bin membership all at once
00206             std::sort(binInfo.begin(), binInfo.end(), binCompare());
00207     
00208             std::vector<int> binBoundaries(numBins + 1);
00209             binBoundaries[0] = 0;
00210             for (int i = 1; i < numBins; i++)
00211             {
00212                 std::pair<int, int> seek = std::make_pair(i, 0);
00213                 std::vector<std::pair<int, int> >::iterator bdry =
00214                             std::lower_bound(binInfo.begin(), binInfo.end(), seek, binCompare());
00215     
00216                 binBoundaries[i] = bdry - binInfo.begin();
00217             }
00218             binBoundaries[numBins] = binInfo.size();   // sentinel
00219 
00220             // Adjust log2 ratios
00221             vector<float> mediansLR(numBins);
00222             vector<float> IQRanges(numBins);
00223 
00224             for (int iBinIndex = 0; iBinIndex < numBins; iBinIndex++)
00225             {
00226                 // Find bin median of autosome log2 ratios
00227                 vector<float> log2ratios;
00228 
00229                 for (
00230                     int iIndex = binBoundaries[iBinIndex];
00231                     iIndex < binBoundaries[iBinIndex + 1];
00232                     iIndex++
00233                 ){
00234                     CNProbeSet *pset = (*getProbeSets())[binInfo[iIndex].second];
00235                     if (pset->getChromosome() != iXChromosome && pset->getChromosome() != iYChromosome)
00236                     {
00237                         if (pset->getLog2Ratio() == pset->getLog2Ratio())
00238                         {
00239                             log2ratios.push_back(pset->getLog2Ratio());
00240                         }
00241                     }
00242                 }
00243 
00244                 int binSize = log2ratios.size();
00245                 if (binSize == 0)
00246                 {
00247                     mediansLR[iBinIndex] = 0.0;
00248                     IQRanges[iBinIndex] = numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN();   // invalid value to flag an empty bin
00249                     continue;
00250                 }
00251                 std::nth_element(log2ratios.begin(), log2ratios.begin() + binSize/2, log2ratios.end());
00252                 mediansLR[iBinIndex] = log2ratios[binSize/2];
00253 
00254                 std::nth_element(log2ratios.begin(), log2ratios.begin() + binSize/4, log2ratios.end());
00255                 float lowerQuartile = log2ratios[binSize/4];
00256 
00257                 std::nth_element(log2ratios.begin(), log2ratios.begin() + 3*binSize/4, log2ratios.end());
00258                 IQRanges[iBinIndex] = log2ratios[3*binSize/4] - lowerQuartile;
00259             }
00260 
00261             bool subtractMedianFromXY = (CovariateParams::m_vLRSubractFromXY[iCovariateIndex] == "on");
00262     
00263             // Subtract the medians from markers in this bin (including X and Y)
00264             for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < probeSetsToProcess.size(); iIndex++)
00265             {
00266                 CNProbeSet *pset = (*getProbeSets())[probeSetsToProcess[iIndex]];
00267                 if (subtractMedianFromXY || (pset->getChromosome() != iXChromosome && pset->getChromosome() != iYChromosome))
00268                 {
00269                     if (pset->getLog2Ratio() == pset->getLog2Ratio())
00270                     {
00271                         pset->setLog2Ratio(pset->getLog2Ratio() - mediansLR[binning[iIndex]]);
00272                     }
00273                 }
00274             }
00275 
00276             // If requested, perform IQR scaling
00277             if (CovariateParams::m_vIQRScaling[iCovariateIndex] == "on")
00278             {
00279                 vector<float> validIQRanges;
00280                 for (int iBinIndex = 0; iBinIndex < numBins; iBinIndex++)
00281                 {
00282                     if (IQRanges[iBinIndex] == IQRanges[iBinIndex])
00283                     {
00284                         validIQRanges.push_back(IQRanges[iBinIndex]);
00285                     }
00286                 }
00287                 int numValidRanges = validIQRanges.size();
00288                 std::nth_element(validIQRanges.begin(), validIQRanges.begin() + numValidRanges/2, validIQRanges.end());
00289                 float medianIQRange = validIQRanges[numValidRanges/2];
00290 
00291                 vector<float> scalingFactors(numBins);
00292                 for (int iBinIndex = 0; iBinIndex < numBins; iBinIndex++)
00293                 {
00294                     if(IQRanges[iBinIndex] == IQRanges[iBinIndex])
00295                     {
00296                         if (IQRanges[iBinIndex] < IQRepsilon)
00297                         {
00298                             scalingFactors[iBinIndex] = 1.0;
00299                         } else {
00300                             scalingFactors[iBinIndex] = medianIQRange/IQRanges[iBinIndex];
00301                         }
00302                     }
00303                 }
00304     
00305                 for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < probeSetsToProcess.size(); iIndex++)
00306                 {
00307                     CNProbeSet *pset = (*getProbeSets())[probeSetsToProcess[iIndex]];
00308     
00309                     // Turn off iqr-scaling for X/Y if subtractMedianFromXY == false - per Ben 1/28/2011
00310                     if (subtractMedianFromXY || (pset->getChromosome() != iXChromosome && pset->getChromosome() != iYChromosome))
00311                     {
00312                         if (pset->getLog2Ratio() == pset->getLog2Ratio())
00313                         {
00314                             pset->setLog2Ratio(pset->getLog2Ratio() * scalingFactors[binning[iIndex]]);
00315                         }
00316                     }
00317                 }
00318             }
00319             if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00320             {
00321                 writeLog2Ratios("afterCovariateAdjust_" + Convert::toString(iCovariateIndex+1) + intermSuffix);
00322                 writeMediansVector("covariateL2rMedians_" + Convert::toString(iCovariateIndex+1) + intermSuffix, mediansLR);
00323             }
00324         }
00325     }
00326     Verbose::progressEnd(3, "Done.");
00327 }
00328 
00329 int CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster::determineBins(vector<float>& covValues, vector<int>& binning, int covariateIndex)
00330 {
00331     if (CovariateParams::useEquallyPopulatedLRBins(covariateIndex))
00332     {
00333         int numBins = CovariateParams::getNumLRBins(covariateIndex);
00334         CNAnalysisMethod::binEqualNumber(covValues, binning, numBins);
00335         return numBins;
00336     }
00337     else if (CovariateParams::useEquallySpacedLRBins(covariateIndex))
00338     {
00339         int numBins = CovariateParams::getNumLRBins(covariateIndex);
00340         CNAnalysisMethod::binEqualSpacing(covValues, binning, numBins);
00341         return numBins;
00342     }
00343     else if (CovariateParams::isLRCovariateDiscrete(covariateIndex))
00344     {
00345         return CNAnalysisMethod::covariateIsBinAssignment(covValues, binning);
00346     }
00347     else // unknown binning
00348     {
00349         // This is a late error.
00350         Err::errAbort("Unknown log2ratio covariate binning type");
00351     }
00352     return 0;
00353 }
00354 
00355 std::vector<int>& CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster::getLRCovariates()
00356 {
00357     return CovariateParams::m_vLRCovariates;
00358 }
